name: Super Ohm
description:
In Super Ohm you have to reestablish communications on printed circuits. To do that, you control an insect that has to join the top border of each circuits. Of course, you have to avoid some electronic components that can either be hiding or in motion.

  • 96 levels to complete
  • 7 electronic components with unique ability to understand
  • Find the shorten path in a minimum amount of a time
  • Use your memory to complete 16 extra challenges

You can download the game on Google Play for your mobile.

And you can also play at Super Ohm with your browser on NewGrounds.

Feel free to give me any feedback on Facebook.
